title: Textile, 1790s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: madder colors block-printed; other colors added by brush; plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 25.5 x 41 cm (10 1/16 x 16 1/8 in.)
Repeat H x W (straight): 24.8 x 17.5 cm (9 3/4 x 6 7/8 in.)
description: Polychrome print in black, purple, blue, green, yellow and reds on an off-white ground. Overlapping pointed arch forms contain a variety of floral and plant patterns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1790s.
1790s. Medium: cotton
Technique: madder colors block-printed; other colors added by brush; plain weave foundation. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-147.
